message: Yusaku: "When was the last time you had sex?"
Yusaku: "Did you masturbate during that time?"
Yusaku: "Why did you choose me to be your first partner?"
Chihiro: "Because... my husband is on a business trip."
Chihiro: "You're the only one... who would do it with me."
Yusaku: "This isn't like some sort of 'unveiling night,' right?"
Yusaku: "You've been in a stable condition for a while."
Yusaku: "Then should I use my fingers instead of my dick?"
Chihiro: "...I wanted you, manager, to do it."
Chihiro: "I told you before... I love... your penis."
Yusaku: "You're excited about having sex after such a long time."
Yusaku: "Do you want me to put my penis in here?"
Chihiro: "Yes... I want you to put it in..."
Yusaku: "But it's unfair to your husband, isn't it?"
Chihiro: "I... I've been fulfilling my duties... to my husband."
Yusaku: "So, even though you've been trying, he couldn't get hard."
Yusaku: "Your husband came to me for advice."
Yusaku: "He himself said he might have erectile dysfunction."
Chihiro: "You've discussed... such things with the manager?"
Yusaku: "We are the best friends in the office. The budget department is almost entirely run by him and me."
Yusaku: "I'm a bit impressed, you know."
Yusaku: "No matter how lascivious you become, you're very tight-lipped when it comes to your marital issues."
Yusaku: "Speaking ill of your husband is totally out of the question."
Yusaku: "Not once have you said a single bad thing about him."
Chihiro: "My love for my husband hasn't changed."
Yusaku: "You don't need to worry about his impotence."
Yusaku: "It's common for hardworking men. If something triggers it, he'll be back to normal soon."
Chihiro: "But I'm not trying to force anything..."
Chihiro: "If I try too hard, I feel like it might stress him out..."
Chihiro: "Anyway, he seems to be enjoying his work right now, and he's full of energy when he leaves and returns home... So I think it's okay as it is."
Chihiro: "He said that he owes his current self to you, Director."
Yusaku: "Not me, but his wife, right?"
Yusaku: "Even the case with the lewd civil servant, it's all thanks to a supportive wife. Nowadays, your husband uses him as a subordinate."
Yusaku: "He's a convenient man to have around. And it's all thanks to you, really."
Chihiro: "I just did what I thought was right..."
Yusaku: "What about your request for my penis?"
Chihiro: "It's thanks to your guidance, Director."
Yusaku: "Your love juice is gushing out."
Chihiro: "It's because... your penis is so big..."
Chihiro: "Yes... I'm... lewd... that's why... I'm so wet..."
Chihiro: "Ha... a little deeper... I can handle it..."
Yusaku: "I'll pull out if you say it hurts."
Chihiro: "I... I won't... spread it more... more... more..."
Yusaku: "Those are words I'd like your old self to hear."
Yusaku: "Tonight is a pre-celebration for childbirth."
Chihiro: "You're not... going to involve the neighbors again, are you?"
Yusaku: "Tonight, it's not a crowd, just one person."
Chihiro: "Today, I locked the door myself."
Yusaku: "What if there's no need to unlock it?"
Chihiro: "I... I don't understand what you're saying."
Yusaku: "...Look at the living room through the gap in the sliding door."
Chihiro: "It's... it's dark, I can't see clearly."
Yusaku: "Aren't you going to greet him?"
Yusaku: "Didn't you say he was your husband?"
Chihiro: "But... but Sho-chan is on a business trip..."
Yusaku: "I coordinated with him to surprise you."
Yusaku: "You wouldn't have any other guests like this, would you?"
Yusaku: "Have you forgotten the face of your beloved husband?"
Yusaku: "Then who's peeking through the sliding door?"
Yusaku: "I'll tell you, I didn't threaten him."
Yusaku: "Isn't it easier to ask someone close by?"
Chihiro: "Ah... ah... this look... I don't want..."
Chihiro: "In front of me... Sho-chan... is here..."
Chihiro: "Ah... it's... it's amazing... Sho-chan, you're... amazing..."
Chihiro: "I'm... coming... more... let it out..."
Chihiro: "Ah... I'm... coming... more... more... ah..."
Chihiro: "I'm... coming... coming... coming... coming... ah."
Chihiro: "Ah, Ah~~~~~~~~~~~Ah, it feels good, my pussy, it feels good, I... I'm... coming... coming~~~~~~~~~ ah."
It's not like we have any control over such a thing.
So, I'll just let myself do what I want.
...The world's most lewd and wonderful wife...
